verses.verse: שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> ye children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because רִ֤יב <WH7379> hath a controversy לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> against יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> with the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land כִּ֠י <WH3588> Because אֵין־ <WH369> there אֱמֶ֧ת <WH571> because [there is] no truth וְֽאֵין־ <WH369> is no חֶ֛סֶד <WH2617> nor mercy וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> there דַּ֥עַת <WH1847> nor knowledge אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

אָלֹ֣ה <WH422> By swearing וְכַחֵ֔שׁ <WH3584> and lying וְרָצֹ֥חַ <WH7523> and killing וְגָנֹ֖ב <WH1589> and stealing וְנָאֹ֑ף <WH5003> and committing adultery פָּרָ֕צוּ <WH6555> they break out וְדָמִ֥ים <WH1818> and blood בְּדָמִ֖ים <WH1818> blood נָגָֽעוּ׃ <WH5060> toucheth

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ן ׀ <WH3651> after that תֶּאֱבַ֣ל <WH56> mourn הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> Therefore shall the land וְאֻמְלַל֙ <WH535> therein shall languish כָּל־ <WH3605> and everyone יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> and every one that dwelleth בָּ֔הּ בְּחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> with the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field וּבְע֣וֹף <WH5775> and with the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also דְּגֵ֥י <WH1709> yea the fishes הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea יֵאָסֵֽפוּ׃ <WH622> also shall be taken away

אַ֥ךְ <WH389> Yet אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> Yet let no man אַל־ <WH408> no יָרֵ֖ב <WH7378> strive וְאַל־ <WH408> no יוֹכַ֣ח <WH3198> nor reprove אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> another וְעַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> for thy people כִּמְרִיבֵ֥י <WH7378> [are] as they that strive כֹהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> with the priest

וְכָשַׁלְתָּ֣ <WH3782> Therefore shalt thou fall הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> in the day וְכָשַׁ֧ל <WH3782> also shall fall גַּם־ <WH1571> also נָבִ֛יא <WH5030> and the prophet עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> by לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> with thee in the night וְדָמִ֖יתִי <WH1820> and I will destroy אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH517> thy mother

נִדְמ֥וּ <WH1820> are destroyed עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> My people מִבְּלִ֣י <WH1097> corruption הַדָּ֑עַת <WH1847> for lack of knowledge כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you הַדַּ֣עַת <WH1847> knowledge מָאַ֗סְתָּ <WH3988> because thou hast rejected וְאֶמְאָֽסְאךָ֙ <WH3988> I will also reject מִכַּהֵ֣ן <WH3547> thee that thou shalt be no priest לִ֔י וַתִּשְׁכַּח֙ <WH7911> to me seeing thou hast forgotten תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> the law אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> of thy God אֶשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> I will also forget בָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> thy children גַּם־ <WH1571> also אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

כְּרֻבָּ֖ם <WH7235> abundance כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> the more חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> so they sinned לִ֑י כְּבוֹדָ֖ם <WH3519> their glory בְּקָל֥וֹן <WH7036> into shame אָמִֽיר׃ <WH4171> against me [therefore] will I change

חַטַּ֥את <WH2403> the sin עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> of my people יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> They eat up וְאֶל־ <WH413> toward עֲוֹנָ֖ם <WH5771> on their iniquity יִשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> and they set נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> their heart

וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> will be like כָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And there shall be like people כַּכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> like priest וּפָקַדְתִּ֤י <WH6485> and I will punish עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> for דְּרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> them for their ways וּמַעֲלָלָ֖יו <WH4611> them their doings אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> and reward לֽוֹ׃

וְאָֽכְלוּ֙ <WH398> For they shall eat וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִשְׂבָּ֔עוּ <WH7646> and not have enough הִזְנ֖וּ <WH2181> they shall commit whoredom וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִפְרֹ֑צוּ <WH6555> and shall not increase כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> to the LORD עָזְב֖וּ <WH5800> because they have left off לִשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> to take heed
זְנ֛וּת <WH2184> Whoredom וְיַ֥יִן <WH3196> and wine וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <WH8492> and new wine יִֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> take away לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> the heart

עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> My people בְּעֵצ֣וֹ <WH6086> counsel at their stocks יִשְׁאָ֔ל <WH7592> ask וּמַקְל֖וֹ <WH4731> and their staff יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> declareth ל֑וֹ כִּ֣י <WH3588> For ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> unto them for the spirit זְנוּנִים֙ <WH2183> of whoredoms הִתְעָ֔ה <WH8582> hath caused [them] to err וַיִּזְנ֖וּ <WH2181> and they have gone a whoring מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> from under their God

עַל־ <WH5921> on רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> upon the tops הֶהָרִ֜ים <WH2022> of the mountains יְזַבֵּ֗חוּ <WH2076> They sacrifice וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הַגְּבָעוֹת֙ <WH1389> upon the hills יְקַטֵּ֔רוּ <WH6999> and burn incense תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Under אַלּ֧וֹן <WH437> under oaks וְלִבְנֶ֛ה <WH3839> and poplars וְאֵלָ֖ה <WH424> and elms כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because ט֣וֹב <WH2896> thereof [is] good צִלָּ֑הּ <WH6738> because the shadow עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that תִּזְנֶ֙ינָה֙ <WH2181> shall commit whoredom בְּנ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1323> therefore your daughters וְכַלּוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH3618> and your spouses תְּנָאַֽפְנָה׃ <WH5003> shall commit adultery

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> without אֶפְק֨וֹד <WH6485> I will not punish עַל־ <WH5921> and בְּנוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1323> your daughters כִּ֣י <WH3588> when תִזְנֶ֗ינָה <WH2181> when they commit whoredom וְעַל־ <WH5921> Or כַּלּֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH3618> nor your spouses כִּ֣י <WH3588> when תְנָאַ֔פְנָה <WH5003> when they commit adultery כִּי־ <WH3588> when הֵם֙ <WH1992> themselves עִם־ <WH5973> with הַזֹּנ֣וֹת <WH2181> with whores יְפָרֵ֔דוּ <WH6504> for themselves are separated וְעִם־ <WH5973> with הַקְּדֵשׁ֖וֹת <WH6948> with harlots יְזַבֵּ֑חוּ <WH2076> and they sacrifice וְעָ֥ם <WH5971> therefore the people לֹֽא־ <WH3808> without יָבִ֖ין <WH995> [that] doth not understand יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <WH3832> shall fall

אִם־ <WH518> Though זֹנֶ֤ה <WH2181> play the harlot אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Though thou Israel אַל־ <WH408> nay יֶאְשַׁ֖ם <WH816> offend יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> [yet] let not Judah וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and come הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <WH1537> not ye unto Gilgal וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> neither go ye up בֵּ֣ית אָ֔וֶן <WH1007> to Bethaven וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תִּשָּׁבְע֖וּ <WH7650> nor swear חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

כִּ֚י <WH3588> Since כְּפָרָ֣ה <WH6510> heifer סֹֽרֵרָ֔ה <WH5637> slideth back סָרַ֖ר <WH5637> as a backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> For Israel עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now יִרְעֵ֣ם <WH7462> will feed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> now the LORD כְּכֶ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> them as a lamb בַּמֶּרְחָֽב׃ <WH4800> in a large place
חֲב֧וּר <WH2266> [is] joined עֲצַבִּ֛ים <WH6091> to idols אֶפְרָ֖יִם <WH669> Ephraim הַֽנַּֽח־ <WH3240> let him alone לֽוֹ׃

סָ֖ר <WH5493> is sour סָבְאָ֑ם <WH5435> Their drink הַזְנֵ֣ה <WH2181> they have committed whoredom הִזְנ֔וּ <WH2181> continually אָהֲב֥וּ <WH157> do love הֵב֛וּ <WH157> love קָל֖וֹן <WH7036> [with] shame מָגִנֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH4043> her rulers

צָרַ֥ר <WH6887> hath bound her up ר֛וּחַ <WH7307> The wind אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> בִּכְנָפֶ֑יהָ <WH3671> in her wings וְיֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <WH954> and they shall be ashamed מִזִּבְחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH2077> because of their sacrifices ס
